channel.title: Sketch MeaXure
channel.description: Make it a fun to create spec for developers and teammates

item.title: Version 3.1.2
item.description: Export panel experience optimize Show only artboards in export panel Export don't cause layer re-arrange, works better with Anima Mark properties optimize Faster toggle hidden/locked of markers Add 'Rename Old Markers', helps to manage exists markers created by Sketch Measure Export: compatible with Sketch Meaxure markers Fix some case cannot export text layer, #1
